text:
Haruki, good work.
How was the rehearsal?

Standing on stage with everyone
in the same costume...

Oh, there are so many idols...!
I was really moved...!
Haha, even though you're an idol too, Haruki.

It's totally different from standing alone...
Feeling like everyone's behind me...

It feels warm, reassuring,
and happy...

Like an angel carrying big wings...
I wonder if that's how it feels...

Sorry,
I tend to talk a lot to you, Producer-san...

No, no.
I'm happy to hear anything you feel, Haruki.
